title: Complete DiGeorge Syndrome
short_description: Clinical document describing Complete DiGeorge syndrome, a rare genetic disorder affecting both males and females with unknown exact prevalence.
long_description: This clinical research document provides information about Complete DiGeorge syndrome, a rare immunodeficiency disorder that affects individuals regardless of gender. The document notes that while the condition impacts both boys and girls equally, the precise incidence and prevalence rates remain undetermined in the medical literature. Complete DiGeorge syndrome is characterized by severe immunodeficiency due to absent or underdeveloped thymus, making it a critical condition requiring specialized medical attention and research.
